name: neumorphism-portfolio
description: Modern portfolio with neumorphism and glassmorphism design

scripts.build: npm run optimize-css && npm run optimize-js && npm run validate-html
scripts.optimize-css: postcss css/*.css --dir dist/css --use autoprefixer --use cssnano --output-style compressed
scripts.test: npm run validate-html && npm run test-lighthouse
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.deploy:validate: npm run build && npm run validate-deployment

author: Portfolio Owner
